name: Noon Academy â€“ Student Learning App
description: Learn from the worlds best teachers along with your friends.   With Noon Academys specially designed app for students, you can attend Live Classes by Top teachers, get your doubts cleared and prepare for your exams. We have Quizzes, Practice questions and much more to make your learning fun and effective.  Worlds Best Teachers: We have the best teachers from your school and your country teaching with us. Join their groups and learn from them.  Interactive Live Classes: Attend Live Classes, participate in Live Chat with your teacher and your friends, and get your doubts cleared  all during the class.  Engage in a friendly competition: challenge your friends to live competition, solve questions, and see who ends up on the top of the leader-board.  All your friends are here: Work on homework assignments and projects with your friends, communicate with them in real-time, collaborate with them, clarify your doubts and help them with theirs.  Practice: Practice makes perfect. Solve lots of questions and revise concepts using the practice sets created by the best teachers in the world.  Revise: Why worry if you missed a class? We have recorded lessons for you to refer to whenever you want to revise a concept.
